action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes two Earth Burst attacks.

action.name: Earth Burst
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hail of Stone {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on a point the lizardfolk can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 15 ({@damage 6d4}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lizardfolk casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
